events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Our team will review your details and get back to you shortly regarding the next steps.
Your application has been categorised under the engineering department, specifically for a developer role focusing on backend systems and devops practices.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile. They will assist you throughout the hiring process and help schedule any upcoming interviews.
You have successfully passed the initial screening round. The screening focused on your engineering experience and skill set relevant to our software developer role.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview. We appreciate your prompt response and enthusiasm for the position.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 2 PM UTC. The interview will focus on software development, programming skills, and devops knowledge.
Congratulations on completing the technical interview. The interviewers were impressed with your problem-solving skills and engineering expertise.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 24th at 11 AM UTC. This session will cover your career goals, cultural fit, and any questions you may have about the company.
The HR interview went well. Our team was very pleased with your responses and believes you would be a great fit for our engineering department.
We are excited to extend a formal offer for the software engineer position. The offer includes compensation details, benefits, and start date options.
Thank you for your feedback regarding the offer. We are glad to hear that you are enthusiastic about joining our engineering team.
You have accepted the job offer. We are thrilled to have you onboard and look forward to your contributions as part of our software development team.
Your onboarding process has started. Welcome to the engineering team! We will provide all necessary resources and support to help you get settled in.
The hiring process is now complete. We officially welcome you as a software engineer in our company. Congratulations and best wishes for your success!
